alert.note: Alert for Larue; Marion; Nelson; Washington (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 11:37AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Nelson, southeastern Larue, northern Marion and southern Washington Counties through 1215 PM EST... At 1137 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Hodgenville, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lebanon around 1155 AM EST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Springfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
